nodes.text: Scott Lawrence (born September 27, 1963) is an American voice actor best-known for his voice role as Darth Vader in many Star Wars games, including Star Wars: TIE Fighter, Star Wars: Rebellion, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, Star Wars: Force Commander, and Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith. In several of these vocal appearances, Scott Lawrence's voice was used over that of actor C. Andrew Nelson. He is considered to be the official "audio double" for the character voiced by James Earl Jones.

Like George Takei, he is one of the few actors who has been in both the Star Wars and Star Trek universe, with a guest spot in a 2001 episode of Star Trek: Voyager and a role in the 2013 feature film Star Trek: Into Darkness.
